Subject: Re: Assigned to Group - Music not playing - [#INC-1246039]

 

Dear Alof,

 

Please provide a repair quotation from AV Pro for the amplifier.

 

Note that the repair for the burst water heater cannot be covered under the insurance. Only the repair costs for the amplifier can be covered in excess of the policy deductible of USD 2,000.

 

If the quotation is more than the mentioned amount, please advise. Otherwise, there is no point in opening a claim file with the insurer.

 

Thank You & Best Regards,

Hagop

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​
